data.event: Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano announced today at a news conference that the U.S. has declared a public health emergency in light of the swine flu outbreak.

event.title: added, "Really that's what we're doing right now

data.event: Secretary Napolitano added, "Really that's what we're doing right now.
Meanwhile, public health officials in Ohio today announced one confirmed case of swine flu in the state.
